original_text: There was not a word of all that Moses commanded that Joshua did not read before all the assembly of Israel, and the women, and the little ones, and the sojourners who lived among them.
korean_text: 모세가 명령한 것은 여호수아가 이스라엘 온 회중과 여자들과 아이와 그들 중에 동행하는 거류민들 앞에서 낭독하지 아니한 말이 하나도 없었더라

sentences.original_text: There was not a word of all that Moses commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 명령한 모든 말씀 중 한 마디도

sentences.original_text: before all the assembly of Israel
and the sojourners who lived among them
